Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay medium, beige; mixed inclusions. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 71, 20? From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0321.14?
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0453)
